column4: i have an Inspirion 6400, ati X1300. im running Ububuntu 6.10. i downloaded 7.04 iso on day of release. i intended a fresh install not upgrade. but had problems, X server wouldnt work ??
fresh install was fine for 6.06 and 6.10
ive heard recently that dell are now doing Ubuntu ;) so i said id give it another shot any help?
what do you need help with exactly?
